events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me well. I would like to request a refund for the order.
The customer's request has been recognized as a refund issue for an item they wish to return due to poor fit.
The case has been assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging for us to proceed?
Sure, my order number is 87456321. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and it is in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a pre-paid return shipping label. Once we receive the jacket back, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the label.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please use it to send the jacket back at your convenience. We consider this case resolved for now.
Just following up to confirm we have received your returned jacket and that your refund was processed successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been issued. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day.
